messages.title: Protecting our green spaces
messages.content: Whether stopping travellers from setting up illegal encampments or Labour from building on our parks; Robert and the Conservatives protect our green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Maximising our transport connections to secure new arts and leisure activities like a Cinema, restaurants and a Museum to make Erdington centre a destination of choice.
Robert has been campaigning for a rule 4 directive to stop family houses being converted into Houses Multiple Occupation without planning. As your MP Robert will campaign to make it illegal.
Fighting to increase Erdington Constabulary back up to its fair share of the new 20,000 Police Officers. Securing a Public Space Protection Order to tackle street drinking, drug use, and begging.
Robert voted leave and will fight to get Brexit delivered and for the extra benefits from taking back control of our laws and money.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cleaner air and tackle climate change
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Robert has a postgraduate diploma in Air Pollution Management. Robert and local Conservatives have a plan to Clean Air Zone for Erdington and Birmingham to help tackle air pollution and improve residents quality of life.
Robert is fighting for tougher action to protect our green spaces from illegal encampments and Labour’s plans to build. Working with local groups to upgrade parks.
Investing an extra £33.9 billion in the NHS. Helping local hospital services.
Hiring 20,000 new police officers. More visible policing.
More funding for every pupil in every school. Giving our young people a better start.

issues.brexitEurope: Take back control - Robert voted leave and will fight to get Brexit delivered and for the extra benefits from taking back control of our laws and money.
issues.environment: Cleaner air and tackle climate change - Robert has a postgraduate diploma in Air Pollution Management. Robert and local Conservatives have a plan to Clean Air Zone for Erdington and Birmingham to help tackle air pollution and improve residents quality of life.
issues.health: Investing an extra £33.9 billion in the NHS. Helping local hospital services.
issues.lawCrime: Hiring 20,000 new police officers. More visible policing.

community.content: Protect our green spaces - Birmingham Labour want to build on local green spaces like Short Heath Playing Fields. Robert is working with local residents to fight back against these plans and to secure funding for improvements to our parks. Robert is fighting for tougher action to stop illegal camps setting up. Robert and local Conservatives have fought to stop Labour’s plans to build on our green spaces and local traveller sites breaking out across our parks.

quotes.text: "Labour's Brexit policy is more delay. They can't even decide whether they want Brexit to happen - and they've had THREE YEARS to decide."

images.caption: Robert inspecting one of the many recent traveller encampments on Puple Hayes Park.

examples: Investing an extra £33.9 billion in the NHS.
Let's end the delays. Let's get Brexit done.
Labour's Brexit policy is more delay.
Cleaner air and tackle climate change.
Fighting to stop Labour's plans to build on our green spaces.
Cleaner air and tackle climate change
Take back control - Robert voted leave and will fight to get Brexit delivered

Let's get Brexit done - So we can invest in billions in our public services.
